comments.text:
Created attachment 584690
Checkpointing work, untested (v.0)

In bug 439716 we finished porting _almost_ all of Satchel from C++ to JS. nsFormFillController.cpp was the one part we didn't because (1) it didn't change often and (2) was harder to port.

Owning C++ code makes me sad. And what better thing to do over the holidays than to curl up with some hot cocoa and port this thing to JS?!

Attached is a hg bundle checkpointing this work (14 changesets, for my reviewer's pleasure). It's 95% ported but completely and utterly untested! The remaining piece to port is the mutation observer code, it's using non-scriptable interfaces but can presumably be done a slightly different way. Haven't looked into it yet.
comments.author: jdinbox@gmail.com
comments.creator: jdinbox@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
In bug 439716 we finished porting _almost_ all of Satchel from C++ to JS. nsFormFillController.cpp was the one part we didn't because (1) it didn't change often and (2) was harder to port.

Owning C++ code makes me sad. And what better thing to do over the holidays than to curl up with some hot cocoa and port this thing to JS?!

Attached is a hg bundle checkpointing this work (14 changesets, for my reviewer's pleasure). It's 95% ported but completely and utterly untested! The remaining piece to port is the mutation observer code, it's using non-scriptable interfaces but can presumably be done a slightly different way. Haven't looked into it yet.
